created.description: ISO-8601 timestamp with zone for when this document was first created.

updated.description: ISO-8601 timestamp with zone for when this document was most recently updated.

contents.description: An object representing a list of each photo that belongs to this album, in order.

^\\d+$.description: The UUID of the document for each photo that belongs to the album, in the order it should appear in.

meta.description: Additional metadata to provide along with the document.
